hero.description: Our mission is to enhance the business growth of our customers with creative designs, development and to deliver market-defining high-quality solutions that create value and reliable competitive advantage of customers around the globe.

about.title: Who we are
about.description: Welcome to ZairTech! Founded in the heart of the UAE, ZairTech has rapidly transformed from a small team of three into a dynamic international company dedicated to delivering exceptional Information Technology services worldwide. Our mission is simple: to turn our clients' visions into reality—often exceeding their expectations. At ZairTech, we transform projects into innovative solutions that enhance our clients' operations and maximize ROI. Our expert team delivers results-driven services that save time and reduce costs. Committed to empowering clients through technology, we build lasting partnerships based on trust and collaboration. With ZairTech, you gain a partner who listens, understands, and delivers. Let’s redefine possibilities together.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: We offer custom web development services using cutting-edge technologies such as React, Angular, PHP, and Node.js. Our expert team delivers scalable, secure, and high-performing websites tailored to your business needs. Whether you require a dynamic e-commerce platform, a robust enterprise web app, or a simple landing page, we ensure an exceptional user experience and seamless performance across all devices.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: We build custom mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. From concept to launch, our team ensures your mobile app is designed with a user-first approach and delivers a smooth, engaging experience. Leveraging React Native and other cross-platform tools, we ensure rapid development, low maintenance, and maximum device compatibility.

services.title: Game Development
services.description: Our game development services bring your creative ideas to life with immersive gameplay, stunning graphics, and multi-platform deployment. We offer end-to-end solutions for game design, development, and testing, ensuring smooth user experiences across mobile, web, and desktop platforms. Our focus is on creating engaging and high-performance games that captivate your audience.

services.title: Ecommerce
services.description: Boost your online business with our feature-rich and scalable e-commerce platforms. We provide custom-built solutions with seamless payment integrations, powerful inventory management, and an intuitive user interface to enhance customer satisfaction and maximize sales. Whether it's Shopify, WooCommerce, or a custom-built solution, we ensure your online store stands out.

services.title: Cloud Services
services.description: Our cloud services help businesses achieve greater scalability, flexibility, and performance by migrating their infrastructure to the cloud. We specialize in cloud strategy, migration, and management services with platforms like AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud. Whether you need to enhance your storage capacity or streamline your workflow, we offer customized solutions to help your business grow.

services.title: Salesforce CRM
services.description: Leverage the power of Salesforce CRM to streamline your business operations and enhance customer relationships. We offer Salesforce customization, integration, and automation services to help you manage your customer data effectively, improve communication, and increase sales productivity. Our solutions are tailored to your specific business needs to ensure optimal performance.

services.title: HRM
services.description: Our HRM software is designed to streamline and automate HR processes, from recruitment and onboarding to performance management and payroll. We offer a comprehensive HRM solution that helps businesses manage their workforce more efficiently, improve employee engagement, and ensure compliance with labor laws. Whether you're a small business or a large enterprise, our HRM software can help you optimize your HR operations and drive business success.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: Our digital marketing services help businesses reach their target audience, drive traffic, and increase conversions. We offer a range of digital marketing solutions, including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, content marketing, and email marketing. Our team of experts develops customized strategies to help you achieve your marketing goals and grow your business online.

services.title: Leads Generation
services.description: Our lead generation services help businesses identify and attract potential customers who are interested in their products or services. We use a combination of digital marketing strategies, data analysis, and lead nurturing techniques to generate high-quality leads that convert into sales. Whether you're a B2B or B2C business, our lead generation services can help you grow your customer base and increase revenue.

services.title: Artificial Intelligence
services.description: Our AI services help businesses leverage the power of artificial intelligence to automate processes, gain insights, and improve decision-making. We offer AI solutions such as machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and predictive analytics to help you unlock the full potential of your data. Whether you're looking to optimize operations, personalize customer experiences, or drive innovation, our AI services can help you achieve your goals.

services.title: HR
services.description: Our HR software is designed to streamline and automate HR processes, from recruitment and onboarding to performance management and payroll. We offer a comprehensive HR solution that helps businesses manage their workforce more efficiently, improve employee engagement, and ensure compliance with labor laws. Whether you're a small business or a large enterprise, our HR software can help you optimize your HR operations and drive business success.

ourApproaches.description: We offer cutting-edge website and mobile app development services for enterprises and businesses of all sizes. At ZairTech, we tailor solutions to meet each client's unique requirements from the initial concept phase to final delivery. Our process is designed to ensure smooth, continuous support and upgrades throughout the project's lifecycle.

experience.title: Tailored Solutions & Ongoing Support
experience.description: We believe in a client-first approach, working closely with you to ensure that the solution is perfectly aligned with your business needs. Our ongoing support and proactive communication ensure a smooth transition from development to deployment, ensuring long-term success.

technology.title: Latest & Stable Technologies
technology.description: We leverage the most advanced and reliable technologies to help your business unlock its full potential. Whether you're a startup or a large enterprise, our tech solutions are designed to scale with your growth.

process.title: Lean & Transparent Workflow
process.description: Our agile, transparent development process keeps you involved at every step, from brainstorming to deployment. This ensures that the final product not only meets but exceeds your expectations.

services.title: Tailored Solutions
services.description: We understand that every business is unique. That’s why we develop custom solutions specifically designed to meet your individual goals and challenges, ensuring a perfect fit for your needs.

services.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
services.description: Our team of experts stays ahead of the curve by leveraging the latest technologies and industry trends. From AI-driven insights to cloud-based infrastructures, we integrate advanced tech to keep your business competitive.

services.title: Proven Expertise
services.description: With years of experience and a track record of success, we have the knowledge and skills to deliver exceptional results. Our team is dedicated to providing top-tier service and support to help you achieve your goals.

services.title: Customer-Centric Approach
services.description: We put our clients first, working closely with you to understand your needs and deliver solutions that exceed your expectations. Your success is our success, and we are committed to helping you thrive.

innovations.title: SysPos
innovations.description: SysPos is a powerful, cloud-based Point of Sale system built using Node.js, Angular, MySQL, and AWS. It simplifies retail operations by offering real-time dashboards, inventory and supplier management, kitchen display systems, and comprehensive sales analysis. With secure cloud infrastructure and insightful KPIs, SysPos ensures businesses can track performance and manage products efficiently. It’s a modern, all-in-one solution for any retail environment looking to enhance productivity and drive growth.

questions.question: What is the process of developing software?
questions.answer: The software development process involves several key stages. It begins with gathering detailed requirements from the client, followed by designing the software architecture. Once the design is finalized, our team of developers codes the software. After development, rigorous testing is performed to ensure it meets client expectations. Finally, the software is deployed and goes live in the client's environment.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop software?
questions.answer: Development timelines vary depending on the project scope and complexity. Typically, smaller projects can take a few weeks, while larger projects might span several months. We provide clear timelines after gathering your requirements.

questions.question: How much does it cost to develop a software?
questions.answer: The cost of software development depends on the project size, functionality, and technology stack. We offer flexible pricing tailored to your business needs and provide detailed estimates upfront.

questions.question: What technologies do you use for software development?
questions.answer: We use the latest and most reliable technologies, including Node.js, React, Angular, Python, AWS, and more, ensuring cutting-edge solutions for all your needs.

questions.question: Why Remote?
questions.answer: Because we believe that when people have the flexibility to work in a way that suits their lifestyle, they are more productive, creative, and engaged. Our clients benefit from seamless IT services, while our team enjoys the freedom and balance that modern technology allows.

questions.question: What is the process of developing a software?
questions.answer: The process of developing a software involves several steps. The first step is to gather requirements from the client. Once the requirements are gathered, the next step is to design the software. After the design is finalized, the development team starts coding the software. Once the coding is complete, the software is tested to ensure that it meets the client's requirements. Finally, the software is deployed to the client's environment.

questions.question: How long does it take to develop a software?
questions.answer: The time it takes to develop a software depends on the complexity of the project. A simple software project can be completed in a few weeks, while a complex project can take several months to complete. The development team will provide you with an estimated timeline for your project based on the requirements you provide.

questions.question: How much does it cost to develop a software?
questions.answer: The cost of developing a software depends on the complexity of the project. A simple software project can cost a few thousand dollars, while a complex project can cost several hundred thousand dollars. The development team will provide you with a detailed cost estimate for your project based on the requirements you provide.

questions.question: What technologies do you use for software development?
questions.answer: We use a wide range of technologies for software development, including Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and many others. The development team will work with you to select the best technologies for your project based on your requirements.

header.description: We provide you end to end software development and consultancy services resulting in extraordinary digital experiences.

innovations.title: MyScienceLand
innovations.description: MyScienceLand is an educational platform designed to transform science learning by offering engaging, interactive tools for schools, teachers, and students. Schools register on the platform, allowing teachers to create diverse quizzes, including multiple-choice, short-answer, and long-answer formats. The platform also provides science-based courses, assessments, and fosters community engagement to enhance learning. Its goal is to make scientific concepts more accessible, enjoyable, and easier to understand, supporting both educators and students in their educational journey.

innovations.title: Wellavi
innovations.description: Wellavi is a comprehensive wellness platform focused on personal coaching and health improvement. It offers users tailored programs to help them achieve their wellness goals through guided coaching, progress tracking, and personalized plans. The platform empowers individuals to enhance their physical and mental well-being by providing essential resources and professional support.

innovations.title: Getbee
innovations.description: Getbee is an all-in-one platform that enhances customer communication through channels like chat, email, and SMS, featuring automated responses and real-time analytics for better support. It connects store experts with customers, offering real-time guidance via chat, video, and audio calls powered by Azure Communication Services (ACS). This integration ensures seamless, high-quality communication that improves user experience.

innovations.title: SysPos
innovations.description: This project is based on Stack: NodeJs, Angular, MySQL, AWS We have developed a point of sale system that covers all the essential retail management areas with ease. Features included in our product are Real Time Dashboard, Inventory Management, Kitchen Dispaly System, Suppliers Management System, Cloudbased Secured System, KPI's & Reporting, Sales Review & Analysis, Product Management All these features make our product a worthy choice.

innovations.title: CryptoSlam
innovations.description: CryptoSlam aims to provide ultimate transparency for millions of NFT collectibles across multiple blockchains. As a trusted NFT data aggregator, buyers and sellers rely on CryptoSlam’s data to make their purchasing and selling decisions. In addition, NFT creators rely on CryptoSlam’s large user base to help promote their brands and NFT drops.

innovations.title: The Space War
innovations.description: This project is based on Stack: VueJs, NodeJS and used online scoring Server.The rules of this game is the same for offline play, online play, casual play and tournament play.You are a commander of a space station in war with another commander and space station. The crew on your station can build spaceships, missiles, defense shields and other things which can attack the enemy station in various ways. If your station gets damaged, you have to flip that many station cards and if you have no station cards left to flip you lose the game.

innovations.title: Turn Based Studio
innovations.description: This project is basesd on Stack: ReactJs and MUI. We design UI/UX of this page. We gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineer's. We illustrate design ideas using storyboards,process flows and sitemaps. We design graphics user interface elements like menus, tabs and widgets. We develop UI mockups and prototypes that illustrate how site function and look like. We create original graphic designs(e.g images, sketches and tabels). We prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders.

innovations.title: hepc-path-tool
innovations.description: This project is based on Stack: VueJs and Php. This project is about a Healthcare platform to find, ask,book, or consult dotors online. It help patients in connecting with verified and authentic doctors so that they can get quality healthcare that is easily accessible, affordable and convenient to get. At the same time, it help doctors to digitize their practices. Millions people have used this website so far to acquire information, book appointments, and take online platform, that serve both patients and doctors

innovations.title: Uqoud
innovations.description: Uqoud is a comprehensive cloud-based contract management solution designed to streamline the contract lifecycle. It offers a range of tools for digital onboarding, contract creation, signing, and archiving, enhancing operational efficiency. Notably, Uqoud incorporates advanced features such as eKYC for identity verification using facial recognition, digital signatures, and AI-powered document forgery detection, ensuring secure and reliable transactions. The platform significantly improves approval processes and enables seamless remote transactions, making it an essential tool for modern businesses.

hero.description: By combining cutting-edge technologies with a deep understanding of our clients’ needs, we ensure success at every stage.

missions.title: What We Do
missions.description: To deliver innovative, custom-tailored web solutions that empower businesses to excel in the digital age. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies, we help our clients enhance their online presence, streamline operations, and achieve sustainable growth. Our mission is to foster long-term partnerships with organizations worldwide by consistently delivering top-quality, scalable, and reliable digital products. We believe that when people have the flexibility to work in a way that suits their lifestyle, they are more productive, creative, and engaged. Our clients benefit from seamless IT services, while our team enjoys the freedom and balance that modern technology allows.

missions.title: What We Aspire To Be
missions.description: At ZairTech, we believe that modern technology should empower people, not confine them to old work models. That’s why we are a 100% remote company, offering IT solutions globally, while giving our employees the freedom to work from anywhere, at any time, with flexible hours. 🌐By eliminating the need for traditional offices, we create a work environment where our team can perform at their best, without the hassle of commuting or rigid office routines. We empower our employees to think and work like entrepreneurs, driving innovation and excellence in every project. 🚀

clientsReviews.name: Ricky Aprilia
clientsReviews.quote: I have been working with QUH Dock for a long 1-year now and I must say that they are the best in the business. They have a team of highly skilled professionals who are always ready to help you out. I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a reliable software development company.

details.title: Reduces Development Cost
description: Developing a functional and well-designed mobile application for your target audience is not inexpensive. That is why the cost tag is usually the first thing companies consider before going ahead with the application development. Mobile application development will cost you less when you outsource an entire development project to an impeccable mobile app agency. You don’t have to hire new employees. Also, you don’t have to worry about extra payroll issues. You don’t have to deal with paid leave or sick days.

details.title: Delivers Better Quality
description: Mobile application outsourcing provides an opportunity to delegate the task to experts with a proven track record to deliver the best quality work on budget and on time. You can focus on your resources and the company’s core competencies this way. When experienced professionals are handling the development, you can rest assured of expert-grade work, on-time delivery, and fast turnaround. For example, if you are an eCommerce store, outsourcing your e-store application to the appropriate agency means that your staff will pay attention to customer service, marketing, and other things to boost your online sales.

benefits.title: BENEFITS
benefits.description: Our employees are our most important assets and our key value proposition is employee development and career growth. Our first priority is hiring from within and growing our employees through coaching, mentoring, and training, both internal and external. We also have a range of exciting initiatives including employee engagement, appreciation, and fun activities all year round.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
points: Develop a full stack of modern frameworks with clean and self-documenting code
Ability to work alone in a project or lead a small team
Work on existing projects, understand the codebase by yourself, and develop new features
Providing innovative web development services that delight our clients
Attend daily stand-up meetings to provide updates on project status
Stay up to date on the latest trends in software development and web development
Abilities from requirements gathering to successful deployment
Work in a cross-functional team to deliver a complete user experience
Create Unit and Integration tests to ensure the quality of code
Documentation skills - good command of the English language

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Developing a functional and well-designed mobile application for your target audience is not inexpensive. That is why the cost tag is usually the first thing companies consider before going ahead with the application development.
points: Dinner after every 3 months
Salery increment after 6 months
Fule allowance for outstation employees
Medical allowance for all employees
Gym allowance for all employees

expectations.title: What you can expect from us after applying
expectations.description: Once you've applied, sit back and relax while we get to work on our side! You can expect to hear back from us within 3 working days. Our recruitment team will call you up on the provided contact number for initial screening. Good luck!

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: ibex. Pakistan is looking for a Senior Customer Support Specialist within the Operations department who shall assist our U.S. based client’s customers with their queries/concerns and provide an accurate resolution to customers as per the defined processes via call. We are looking for people who have experience in dealing with international customers but above that, we care more about personality, passion, and work ethic. A sense of humor helps a lot too.

We are looking for people who have experience in dealing with international customers but above that, we care more about personality, passion, and work ethic. A sense of humor helps a lot too.

benefits.description: Developing a functional and well-designed mobile application for your target audience is not inexpensive. That is why the cost tag is usually the first thing companies consider before going ahead with the application development.

expectations.title: What you can expect from us after applying
expectations.description: Once you've applied, sit back and relax while we get to work on our side! You can expect to hear back from us within 3 working days. Our recruitment team will call you up on the provided contact number for initial screening. Good luck!

footer.heading: Zair Tech + You
footer.description: At Zair Tech, we develop cutting-edge digital solutions tailored to solve complex business challenges. Partner with us to turn your vision into scalable, innovative products.
